scenario_text.value: Kaito? What are you doing?

You know how we didn’t fight much today?
I thought I’d make up for that by training.

And he’s got me going along with it. Talk
about a pain in the neck.

Hey, quit complaining and let’s go again.
I can’t get into this if I’m not facin’ you.

Oh, all right. I guess I can’t say no when
you put it like that.

We’re coming up on the end of all this, you
know. We gotta be ready.
Kaito...

(You might not think it to look at him, or to
hear him talk, but Kaito’s a good guy.)

(And he’s got a point. Maybe I should join
him. Oh, but I’d hate to get in his way.)
(How should I handle this guy?)
Compliment Kaito.
Stay out of the way.
Train with Kaito.
Compliment Kaito.
You know, you’re a good guy, Kaito.
Huh? What’s gotten into you all of a sudden?

I was just thinking how nervous I was when
I met you, because you seemed so rough.

But seeing how you protect not only Miu, but
all of us, how you jump into danger...

The more time we’ve spent together, the more
I’ve been able to realize how nice you are.

Aw, cut it out, would you? Hearin’ stuff like
that makes me feel like I’m gettin’ a rash.

No, keep going, Takuma! Kaito never gives
himself enough credit.

You should try softening up your speech or
your looks. Then you wouldn’t put people off.

Hey, shut up! It’s not like I’m tryin’ to get
people to like me.

Anyway, enough of this. If you’re just gonna
annoy me, you can go somewhere else.

(Maybe I went a little too far. It was worth
it to see Kaito so flustered, though.)
Stay out of the way.

All right, well, I’ll leave you to it. Good
luck with the training!
What, you’re not going to join in?

Nah, I feel like I’d only slow you down.
I think I’d better pass.

Hey, you don’t gotta worry about slowin’ me
down, but I’m not gonna force you.

Okay, well, keep it up! Just make sure you’re
back in time for dinner.
Yeah, got it. See you later!
Train with Kaito.

You know, that’s a good point. You mind if
I join you?

Sure, no problem. Training with you oughta be
a good workout.
Haha, go easy on me, okay?
I’m gonna train too!

We can make it a team match, then. You ready
for this, Dracumon?

You bet I am! Let’s show ’em what real
teamwork looks like!

Phew, that was a real workout. I’ll head back
after I take a quick break. You go on ahead.
